header.title: Questions? We have answers.
header.subtitle: Everything you need to know about implementing Curify in your organization.

medical-office.question: Is Curify fully integrated with IDIKA/EOPYY?
medical-office.answer: Yes. Curify offers native 2-way synchronization with the National E-Prescription System. You can issue prescriptions and referrals directly within the app without logging into the IDIKA portal separately.

medical-office.question: Does it connect with myData (AADE)?
medical-office.answer: Absolutely. Every receipt or invoice generated triggers an automatic real-time transmission to myData/AADE. Your tax compliance is handled in the background, eliminating accounting errors.

medical-office.question: Can I access my data from my phone?
medical-office.answer: Yes. Curify is a cloud-native Progressive Web App (PWA). You have full access to patient files, your calendar, and prescribing tools securely from any iOS or Android device.

clinic.question: Can we restrict what secretaries see?
clinic.answer: Yes. We utilize strict Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). Reception staff can manage schedules and billing but are technically blocked from viewing sensitive clinical notes or medical history.

clinic.question: We use legacy software. Can you migrate our data?
clinic.answer: Yes. We offer a 'White-Glove Migration Service'. We extract data from legacy systems (e.g., MedExpress, Watson), clean it, and map it into Curify so you retain your complete patient history.

clinic.question: Does it support different medical specialties?
clinic.answer: Yes. Each doctor gets a tailored view. Cardiologists see EKG data fields, while Dermatologists see Body Mapping tools, all within the same unified clinic environment.

hospital.question: Do you integrate with LIS and PACS?
hospital.answer: Yes. Curify is built on HL7 and FHIR standards. We build custom bridges to pull Lab Results (LIS) and Imaging (PACS) directly into the central patient timeline automatically.

hospital.question: Can we host Curify on our own servers?
hospital.answer: For Enterprise partners, we offer On-Premise deployment or Private Cloud instances to satisfy specific data sovereignty, low-latency, and internal IT governance requirements.

hospital.question: Is the platform GDPR compliant?
hospital.answer: Fully. We employ military-grade AES-256 encryption, maintain EU-based data centers, and provide granular Audit Logs that track every single data interaction for compliance reporting.
